name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm
description:
World of Warcraft: Cataclysm is a RPG massively multiplayer game. It came out on 07-12-2010. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. World of Warcraft: Cataclysm has a Metascore of 90, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
World of Warcraft: Cataclysm is available on PC and macOS.
